meanings.definition: A large, round fruit with green skin, pink flesh, and black seeds.
meanings.sent1: I ate a delicious watermelon at the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The watermelon was so juicy and refreshing on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent3: The watermelon rolled off the table and surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and sweet as a ripe watermelon.
meanings.sent5: The watermelon burst with flavor in my mouth, making me smile.

meanings.definition: The juicy, sweet flesh of a watermelon.
meanings.sent1: I love the taste of watermelon on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The watermelon flesh was so ripe and succulent.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally dropped the watermelon, creating a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet and refreshing as watermelon flesh.
meanings.sent5: The watermelon flesh melted in my mouth like a sweet treat.

meanings.definition: A plant of the gourd family that produces watermelons.
meanings.sent1: The watermelon plant in our garden is growing well.
meanings.sent2: We planted seeds and now have a thriving watermelon plant.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel nibbled on the watermelon plant leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like a flourishing watermelon plant.
meanings.sent5: The watermelon plant swayed in the breeze, full of promise.
